text: Konstanty Rokossovsky, Polish: Konstanty Rokossowski, (21 December 1896 in Warsaw - 3 August 1968 in Moscow) was a Marshal of the Soviet Union (1944), a Marshal of Poland (1949), and twice a Hero of the Soviet Union (1944, 1945). In World War II he commanded an army in the Moscow battle, Bryansk, and Donskoy fronts (in the Stalingrad battle).www.hrono.info == References == Category:1896 births Category:1968 deaths Category:Polish communist politicians Category:Politicians from Warsaw Category:Soviet generals Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II
title: Konstantin Rokossovsky
